Package com.espertech.esper.core.start

Classes related to start and stop of statements

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    EPPreparedExecuteIUDSingleStreamExec  
    EPPreparedExecuteMethod
    Starts and provides the stop method for EPL statements.
    EPStatementDestroyMethod
    Method to call to destroy an EPStatement.
    EPStatementStartMethod
    Starts and provides the stop method for EPL statements.
    EPStatementStopMethod
    Method to call to stop an EPStatement.
